properties.entry: SELECT c.mainMobile AS mobile FROM main_customer c WHERE c.id IN ( SELECT mch.customerId FROM mid_customer_house mch WHERE mch.houseId = #houseId# and IFNULL(mch.isDeleted,0)=0 )

SELECT mh.assistCode AS assistCode, mp.`code` AS projectCode FROM main_house AS mh, main_project AS mp, mid_project_house AS mph WHERE mh.id = #houseId# AND mh.id = mph.houseId AND mp.id = mph.projectId limit 1
